attributes.additional_details: The Government must take decisive action to address the serious issue of illegal immigration in the UK. Illegal immigration undermines our national laws, places a strain on public resources. A national strategy is needed to ensure that illegal migrants are identified, detained and deported. This strategy should include all necessary legislative, diplomatic, logistical, and financial resources to effectively enforce immigration laws and restore public confidence in the security of our borders.
attributes.background: The Government must implement a comprehensive national strategy to identify, detain and deport all individuals living illegally in the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729231
